name: Army Cargo Plane Flight Simulator: Transport War Tank in Battle-Field
name_original: Army Cargo Plane Flight Simulator: Transport War Tank in Battle-Field
description:
Fly a military cargo jet and transport military warhead including tanks to the battlefield. Drive a tank and safely park it inside the plane. Then use Forklift crane to load cargo boxes on plane. Airdrop tank in the battlefield and drive it to destroy enemy bases and buildings.

Play the role of a military pilot and fly cargo plane carrying military equipment and tanks. Use Forklift crane to load cargo boxes carrying military warhead onto the plane. Drive and park a tank inside the cargo jet and then fly off to airdrop it in the battlefield. Carefully operate the crane or you will damage sensitive equipment. Take off and carry the cargo to its destination and deliver safely to complete the mission. Airdrop tanks using parachutes right in the middle of battlefield. Then drive the tank and shoot missiles at enemy bases to destroy them. The soldiers on the ground need you to provide them air support. Land the plane and unload cargo boxes using forklift crane to complete the mission.

Download Army Cargo Plane Flight Simulator now to become an airforce pilot and deliver tanks and military cargo.

Give us your feedback in the reviews section so that we can improve your gaming experience.
